meanings.definition: A person who prefers something over another.
meanings.sent1: She is a preferrers of chocolate ice cream.
meanings.sent2: The preferrers in the group always choose the beach over the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The preferrers at the party made sure to grab the last slice of pizza.
meanings.sent4: In a world of options, she stood out as the ultimate preferrers of simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The little girl, a true preferrers of pink, painted her room in various shades of the color.

meanings.definition: Those who have a tendency to choose one option over another.
meanings.sent1: The preferrers in the family always pick pizza for dinner.
meanings.sent2: As preferrers of early mornings, they enjoyed watching the sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The preferrers of sunny days were delighted when the rain finally stopped.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the preferrers of adventure, always seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The preferrers of spicy food couldn't resist trying the new hot sauce.
